headline.main: U.S. Protests 'Sloppy,' Unsafe Russian Intercept of Spy Plane
headline.print_headline: U.S. Protests 'Sloppy,' Unsafe Russian Intercept of Spy Plane

docs.snippet: The United States said on Monday it has expressed its concerns to Moscow over a Russian fighter jet's "sloppy" and unsafe intercept of a U.S. spy plane in international airspace, in the latest sign of tensions between the two countries....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States said on Monday it has expressed its concerns to Moscow over a Russian fighter jet's "sloppy" and unsafe intercept of a U.S. spy plane in international airspace, in the latest sign of tensions between the two countries.

headline.main: Ex-BP Chief John Browne to Quit Riverstone Board-Sky News
headline.print_headline: Ex-BP Chief John Browne to Quit Riverstone Board-Sky News

docs.snippet: Former BP chief executive John Browne will be vacating his spot on the board of investment company Riverstone Energy to focus on work for a Russian-backed energy venture, Sky News reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former BP chief executive John Browne will be vacating his spot on the board of investment company Riverstone Energy to focus on work for a Russian-backed energy venture, Sky News reported.

headline.main: Sen. Menendez Returns to Senate Routine After Indictment
headline.print_headline: Sen. Menendez Returns to Senate Routine After Indictment

docs.snippet: Sen. Bob Menendez took a business-as-usual approach Monday when he returned to Congress for the first time since his April 1 indictment on federal corruption charges....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sen. Bob Menendez took a business-as-usual approach Monday when he returned to Congress for the first time since his April 1 indictment on federal corruption charges.

headline.main: Ahead of UK Election, Labour Leads Conservatives by One Point: YouGov Poll
headline.print_headline: Ahead of UK Election, Labour Leads Conservatives by One Point: YouGov Poll

docs.snippet: Ahead of Britain's May 7 election, a YouGov poll on Monday evening said Labour leads by one point, with 34 percent, followed by the Conservatives at 33 percent, UKIP at 13 percent, Liberal Democrats at 8 percent and the Greens at 6 percent, the Su...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ahead of Britain's May 7 election, a YouGov poll on Monday evening said Labour leads by one point, with 34 percent, followed by the Conservatives at 33 percent, UKIP at 13 percent, Liberal Democrats at 8 percent and the Greens at 6 percent, the Sun newspaper reported.

headline.main: Obama Threatens to Veto 2 Bills Targeting Wall Street Rules
headline.print_headline: Obama Threatens to Veto 2 Bills Targeting Wall Street Rules

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama is threatening to veto two bills that the White House says would undermine the Dodd-Frank financial reforms put in place after the economic crash. Both of the bills affect housing....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama is threatening to veto two bills that the White House says would undermine the Dodd-Frank financial reforms put in place after the economic crash. Both of the bills affect housing.

headline.main: Crosby's Return to Broadway Headlines NHL East Playoffs
headline.print_headline: Crosby's Return to Broadway Headlines NHL East Playoffs

docs.snippet: Sidney Crosby and the Pittsburgh Penguins took so long to clinch a playoff berth, they almost missed the postseason altogether....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby and the Pittsburgh Penguins took so long to clinch a playoff berth, they almost missed the postseason altogether.

headline.main: Fueling Up for a Long Campaign: Hillary Clinton Lunches at Chipotle

docs.snippet: Driving to Iowa for her first campaign swing on Monday, Hillary Rodham Clinton stopped for lunch at a Chipotle in Maumee, Ohio, outside Toledo....
docs.abstract: Driving to Iowa for her first campaign swing on Monday, Hillary Rodham Clinton stopped for lunch at a Chipotle in Maumee, Ohio, outside Toledo.

headline.main: Amendment Curbs Bolster Momentum for Medicare Doctors Bill
headline.print_headline: Amendment Curbs Bolster Momentum for Medicare Doctors Bill

docs.snippet: Curbs on amendments and a desire to resolve an issue that has long plagued lawmakers added momentum Monday to Senate leaders' push toward final congressional approval of legislation reshaping how Medicare reimburses doctors....
docs.lead_paragraph: Curbs on amendments and a desire to resolve an issue that has long plagued lawmakers added momentum Monday to Senate leaders' push toward final congressional approval of legislation reshaping how Medicare reimburses doctors.

headline.main: Rubio: Presidency Not Reserved for Rich, Powerful
headline.print_headline: Rubio: Presidency Not Reserved for Rich, Powerful

docs.snippet: Sen. Marco Rubio says the White House is not reserved for the rich and powerful, and says he, the son of a bartender and a maid, has the same chance to serve as those who come from power and privilege....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sen. Marco Rubio says the White House is not reserved for the rich and powerful, and says he, the son of a bartender and a maid, has the same chance to serve as those who come from power and privilege.
